About

Integrity Compounds Faster Than Hype.

Ainary Ventures is a multi-arm platform built by operators, for operators.

We invest in founders solving real problems in traditional industries ‚Äî manufacturing, legal, enterprise operations. We build AI products that ship to production environments, not sandbox demos. And we teach what we learn, transparently ‚Äî including what didn't work.

Every arm feeds the others: products prove technical depth, consulting surfaces deal flow, investments validate our thesis, and content compounds our reach. It's a flywheel no single-arm competitor can replicate.

We're honest about what works and what doesn't, because integrity compounds faster than hype.

What We Do

AI That Ships. For Industries That Build.

Six practice areas. One philosophy: production-grade AI with measurable outcomes ‚Äî or we tell you not to bother.

üè≠

Manufacturing AI

CNC automation, production planning, and predictive maintenance powered by AI that reads CAD/CAM files and generates machine code. We've cut planning time by 70% and error rates to <0.2%. Not "AI for manufacturing" ‚Äî AI that IS the manufacturing workflow.

Learn more
üì∞

Media & Publishing

Content intelligence, automated editorial workflows, and audience analytics for publishers navigating the AI transition. We build systems that augment editorial teams ‚Äî not replace them. AI-assisted content at scale, with human judgment intact.

Learn more
‚öñÔ∏è

Legal Tech

Contract analysis, legal research, and compliance monitoring built on multi-agent architectures with sub-0.2% hallucination rates. Shipped to production for enterprise legal teams. We built the system. We know where it breaks.

Learn more
üóÇÔ∏è

Office & Operations

Intelligent document processing, workflow automation, and operational AI that integrates into existing enterprise stacks. No rip-and-replace. No 18-month implementation timelines. Production-ready AI that plugs into what you already use.

Learn more
üéì

Workshops & Training

Hands-on AI training for technical teams and leadership. Not "intro to ChatGPT" workshops ‚Äî deep implementation sessions on RAG architecture, agent systems, and production deployment. We teach what we build. Frameworks, tools, and hard-won lessons.

Learn more
üíº

Advisory & Strategy

Fractional CTO and AI strategy for companies that need technical leadership without a full-time hire. Architecture review, vendor evaluation, build-vs-buy analysis. We'll tell you when NOT to use AI. That's the most valuable advice.

Learn more

Our check size: $250K‚Äì$750K. Our value-add: architecture review, technical diligence, and operational playbooks from scaling B2B SaaS. We've been in your seat. We know the difference between a demo and a deployment.

CONTRARIAN TAKES Jan 22, 2026

Most Companies Don't Need AI Consultants. Here's What They Need Instead.

If your data isn't clean, your org chart is broken, or you're shopping for hype ‚Äî hiring us won't help. Here's when NOT to call.

5 min read
Read all insights ‚Üí

When NOT to Hire Us.

Transparency isn't a marketing trick. It's our operating system. Here's when we're the wrong choice:

"You need a chatbot."

If all you want is a customer support bot, there are faster, cheaper options. We build production AI for complex workflows.

"You want a 200-slide transformation roadmap."

We ship code, not PowerPoints. If you need a strategy deck to convince your board before building anything, we're not the right fit.

"Your data isn't ready."

AI without clean data is expensive theater. We'll help you assess readiness, but won't sell you a project that will fail.

"You want to 'add AI' for the press release."

If AI doesn't solve a specific, measurable problem in your workflow, don't build it. We'll tell you that for free.

Still here? Then we should talk.
